labelMonteCarlo.name: Metropolis algorithm configuration
labelMonteCarlo.style: color:white; font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-weight: bold;

numberOfMCSteps.name: Requested number of Monte Carlo samples

labelSamples.name: Samples display options
labelSamples.style: color:white; font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-weight: bold;

labelNormalModeWaveFunc.name: Normal mode analytic wave function display
labelNormalModeWaveFunc.style: color:white; font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-weight: bold;

waveFuncConfigLabel.name: Wave function modification options
waveFuncConfigLabel.style: color:white; font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-weight: bold;

useStationary.name: Energy eigenstate (Expect poor Metropolis convergence for highly excited modes. Single product of normal mode eigenstates only.)

noteForUseSingleExcitations.name: (Will be difficult to differentiate any differences from the ground unless a large number of samples are used.)

coherentOrSqueezedSelectedLabel.name: If 'Coherent' or 'Squeezed' selected:
coherentOrSqueezedSelectedLabel.style: color:white; font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-weight: bold;

clickActionNormal.name: Behaviour when modifying a selected normal mode amplitude expectation value with the mouse cursor:
clickActionNormal.value: {0, {"Change selected while setting others to zero", "Modify selection only"}}

squeezedSelectedLabel.name: If 'Squeezed' selected:
squeezedSelectedLabel.style: color:white; font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-weight: bold;

squeezedFactor.name: Squeeze factor for an individual normal mode

squeezedStateRelStDevLabel.name: (Click on a normal mode for this slider to take effect)

energyEigenstatesSelectedLabel.name: If 'Energy eigenstate' selected:
energyEigenstatesSelectedLabel.style: color:white; font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-weight: bold;

addEnergy.name: Click on normal mode to add energy

DispersionOptionsLabel.name: Dispersion relation options
DispersionOptionsLabel.style: color:white; font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-weight: bold;
